headline: Cash In On The Luck Of The Irish With 5 St. Patrick's Day Stocks Near Buy Points

headline: Should You Invest in Aon plc (AON)?
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Large Cap Concentrated Fund” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Q4 saw an uneven increase in markets, capping off yet another strong year for the markets. Stocks broadly increased after the US election, but some gave up most or all […]

headline: Aon Announces Transition of President
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, announced today that Eric Andersen has transitioned from his role as president to serve as a senior advisor to Greg Case, CEO of Aon, through June 2026. The role of president has been assumed by Case.

raw.headline: Aon Announces Transition of President
raw.summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, announced today that Eric Andersen has transitioned from his role as president to serve as a senior advisor to Greg Case, CEO of Aon, through June 2026. The role of president has been assumed by Case.
